text.text: Although I have contributed to many components in the Predix Design System other than px-vis, px-slider is one that is almost entirely my code.

The original px-slider was riddled with technical debt, so I took it upon myself to do a complete rewrite of the component. The new px-sider is much more maintainable, efficient, and extensible than the previous version.

images.caption: A single value slider and a mutli-value slider
